desc: Auckland based producers of New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling, Merlot, Malbec, Moscato, Cabernet, Port, Sherry, Liqueurs, Honey Wine. Blueberry Wine. Producers of rare wines such as Muscat and White Diamond, Isabella, Dr Hogg, Black Hamburg and Chambourcin. Wine exporters to Asia, Canada, Europe and USA.
